@/@item/@_xworker_design_window_/@buttons/@updateButton/@handler
sname
handler
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var tree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_design_window_treePanel');
var selectedNode = tree.getSelectionModel().getSelectedNode();
if(selectedNode){
    var xd = Ext.ns('Ext.xworker.design');
    xd.refresh(selectedNode.id, selectedNode.thing);
}
#$@text#$@

#$@text#$@
var tree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_design_window_treePanel');
var selectedNode = tree.getSelectionModel().getSelectedNode();
if(selectedNode){
    var xd = Ext.ns('Ext.xworker.design');
    xd.remove(selectedNode.id, selectedNode.thing);
}
#$@text#$@

    xd.remove(selectedNode.id, selectedNode.thing);
}

@/@item/@_xworker_design_window_/@refreshCurrentThing
sname
refreshCurrentThing
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var tree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_design_window_treePanel');
var selectedNode = tree.getSelectionModel().getSelectedNode();
if(selectedNode){
    var xd = Ext.ns('Ext.xworker.design');
    xd.refresh(selectedNode.id, selectedNode.thing);
    
    var win = Ext.ns('XWorker_Design_DesignWindow');
    win.init({});
}
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing/@thing
sinheritDescription
false
sth_createIndex
false
sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark
false
sid
refreshCurrentThing
@/@item/@_xworker_design_window_/@setSelection
sname
setSelection
sparams
id
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var design = Ext.ns("Ext.xworker.design");
design.selectDesignNode(id);
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing/@thing
sinheritDescription
false
sth_createIndex
false
sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark
false
sid
setSelection
@/@item/@_xworker_design_window_/@openOtherControl
sname
openOtherControl
sparams
thingPath
suseChildsCode
false
scode
window.open('do?sc=' + thingPath);
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing

svarglobal

sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing/@thing
sinheritDescription

sth_createIndex

openOtherControl
@/@init
sname
init
sparams
value
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
//激活控件
var cmps = 'xworker_design_window_editButton,xworker_design_window_updateButton,xworker_design_window_deleteButton'.split(',');
for(i=0; i<cmps.length; i++){
    var cmp = Ext.getCmp(cmps[i]);
    if(cmp){
        cmp.setDisabled(true);
    }
}
    
var design = Ext.ns('Ext.xworker.design');
design.initDesignTree();

if(value && value.selectedId){
    design.selectNode(value.selectedId);
}
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.xw.remote.RemoteWidget/@initFunction
sinheritDescription
false
sth_createIndex
false
sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark

sid
init
